description: React component for the note detail page, allowing viewing, editing, creating, and deleting notes with interaction with backend via custom hooks and routing.

methods.name: NoteDetailPage({ isNew: forcedNew })
methods.description: Main React component for displaying and managing note details with create, update, and delete functionalities.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles the save operation for creating or updating a note, including navigation upon success and error handling.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles deletion of a note with user confirmation followed by navigation.
